post_text: Today, middle school students from Frau Carroll's art class visited BluDot (https://www.bludot.com) furniture company in Northeast Minneapolis. The field trip was the culmination of a pilot product design project for 7th and 8th grade art students who had been learning about product design. Students first designed a chair using paper index cards, and then in teams developed a single, large scale prototype using heavy gauge cardboard supplied by BluDot. A senior BluDot product designer explained their product development process, and then evaluated each team's chair and shared feedback with the students. Many thanks to BluDot for hosting TCGIS students!

We would like to inform you that TCGIS will conduct dismissal as usual today. All after-school activities and music lessons will take place and Kinderclub will stay open until 6pm.

Should you have an emergency and can't get to your bus stop on time, please call us as soon as possible at 651-492-7106. We will stay in contact with our bus company and will send busing updates via email and PikMyKid as we receive them.

2. If you will be significantly late to pick your student up from school, please contact the front office.

We will continue to monitor tomorrow's forecast and will keep you informed should there be changes to tomorrow's schedule.
